reporting-org.narrative: New Zealand Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade

description.narrative: This proposed activity will support the law and justice sector in the Solomon Islands. It will build on the support to this sector following the significant investment in the Regional Assistance Mission to Solomon Islands (RAMSI), by supporting Royal Solomon Islands Police Force to implement crime prevention methodologies.
